Package com.deco2800.game.components.player

Class DoubleJumpComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.components.player.DoubleJumpComponent
public class DoubleJumpComponent
extends Component
Class to handle the player double jumping. This class controls; - the players jumping state - triggering of descent after JUMP_TIME is up, and - determining if collisions which result in the reset of the jumping occur. Standard jumping functionality is still within the KeyboardPlayerInputComponent (@see) class.
See Also:
KeyboardPlayerInputComponent

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      Sets up listener for players' collisions with other physics objects.
      Overrides:
      create in class Component

    • checkJumpOnUpdate

      public void checkJumpOnUpdate()
      Called on every frame. Handles checking if the player should begin falling based on their JUMP_TIME, and triggers the fall if their jumping duration is up.

    • setMapEdges

      public void setMapEdges​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​Entity> mapFixtures)
      Sets the edges of the current game map. This allows for finer control of the player on collision with a map edge.
      Parameters:
      mapFixtures - the edges of the map; FLOOR, RIGHT_WALL, LEFT_WALL, ROOF.

    • setIsJumping

      public void setIsJumping​(boolean jumping)
      Sets whether or not the player is currently in a 'jumping' state (either single or double jump)
      Parameters:
      jumping - true if the player is currently jumping, else false.

    • getIsJumping

      public boolean getIsJumping()
      Return whether or not the player is currently jumping
      Returns:
      true if the player is currently jumping, else false.

    • notDoubleJumping

      public boolean notDoubleJumping()
      Returns whether the player is double-jumping or not. Used to control whether the player should be allowed to jump again.
      Returns:
      true if the player is not double-jumped, else false.

    • nextJumpState

      public void nextJumpState()
      Sets the player to the next jumping state, where the ordering is LANDED, JUMPING, DOUBLE_JUMPING.

    • getJumpState

      public DoubleJumpComponent.JumpingState getJumpState()
      Returns the players' current jumping state.
      Returns:
      the current jump state of the player. This will either be LANDED, JUMPING or DOUBLE_JUMPING.

    • setJumpStartTime

      public void setJumpStartTime​(long time)
      Sets the start time of the players' current jump. Called when a player jump is processed successfully.
      Parameters:
      time - the time that the player stated jumping, in absolute milliseconds since game start.

    • setLanded

      public void setLanded()
      Sets the player to the 'LANDED' jumping state.

    • isLanded

      public boolean isLanded()
      Returns whether or not the player is in the 'LANDED' jumping state.
      Returns:
      true if the player is currently LANDED, else false.
